message.content: Publish a new version of nx

summary: PR Title Update for Nx Graph Port Handling

content.text: I'll help you publish a new version of Nx. Let me start by checking the current setup and creating a todo list to track this process.

todos.content: Check current git status and ensure we're on the correct branch
Review recent commits and determine version type (patch/minor/major)
Run development setup and build to ensure everything works

c8a6ffb6ab docs(misc): fix issue with GA events during local development (#31376)
d74c39e9be docs(nx-dev): add blog post about TUI integration with LLM (#31373)

c7a9c71c07 fix(linter): handle `ng-package.json` file with no `lib.entryFile` in `@nx/enforce-module-boundaries` rule (#31360)

c5e7f0253e chore(repo): fix formatting

3e3402bad5 docs(nx-dev): practical guide for AI and coding (#31362)
